level.heading: Application to revised wage orders.
level.text: Section 32-1004(a) shall not apply to any revised wage order issued by the Wage-Hour Board that sets a minimum wage that is higher than the minimum wage set by this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-248
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-248, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 32-1001.
